red faction is not a bad shooter game but i recommend it with a couple of cautionary notes  first the exploding sub you can find help for this in the forum and then the end sequence which i found bizarre  the game becomes rather tricky towards the end but overall its good fun for a couple of quid

in my time with red faction 1 i found the story mode to be quite enjoyable however accessing the online modes often necessitates using alternative launchers which can be a hassle unfortunately the presence of hackers detracts from the experience making it frustrating for those of us who prefer to rely on skill rather than cheats this game could really benefit from a modern update or remaster disappointing to say the least
great game true hours played are a lot more than reflected because i downloaded the dash faction mod to fix a few bugs with modern pcs one of the best shooters ive played in a while

fantastic game for its time cant believe im playing it 23 yrs later download dash faction give it good modern settings and download the ai upscaled texture pack and have fun this was a great game on ps2 in 2001 and its a great game now not as well oiled as a half life but apparently a small team studio but they tried a lot of cool things
